name: Shapy - Team 20
description:
Shapy is a local cooperative game made during a three days jam!

Play a set of three shape characters with your friends and help them escape from levels.

Use the capacity of each character to overcome challenges, help your mates and get out from underground world.

Enter the cuteness of Shapy, give it a try!

Warning: you need to plug at least one controller to be able to play in local with your friends.

FEATURES LIST

-A 2D charming world.

-Simple controls.

-Fun cooperation.

-7 levels to cross.

CREDITS

Developped by: Nam Mirbeau Baudin - Léo Nimsgern - Raphaël Menal-Fuchs

Designed by: François Loing - Enriqué Egido - Paul Bourdeau

Graphics by: Charles Bouyssou - Terence Thellier

Musics/Sound design by: Martin Arribard

Produced by: Maxime Chaize
